list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a period of time equal to a twenty-fourth part of a day and night and divided into 60 minutes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một hoạt động kéo dài hai giờ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a time of day specified as an exact number of hours from midnight or midday.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the clock in the sitting room struck the hour
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đồng hồ trong phòng khách đánh vào giờ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fixed period of time for an activity, such as work, use of a building, etc.
(in the Western Church) a short service of psalms and prayers to be said at a particular time of day, especially in religious communities.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an organized life of prayer including the canonical hours
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một cuộc sống của lời cầu nguyện có tổ chức bao gồm các giờ kinh điển

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: 15° of longitude or right ascension (one twenty-fourth part of a circle).
